attributes.action: To Make John Smeaton Chief Protector of Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: John Smeaton, is a Scottish hero, he not only unselfishly and unknowingly took out a terrorist armed with a suicide belt, he saved many other with his act or bravery.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
